sentences.sContent: A hydrocarbon was known to be either an alkene or alkane.
sentences.sContent_eng: A hydrocarbon was known to be either an alkene or alkane.
sentences.sCn: 某碳氢化合物已知可能是烯烃或是烷烃。

sentences.sContent: As one of substitutes for fire-extinguishing agent of halogenated hydrocarbon, fire-extinguishing agent of halogenated hydrocarbon produces lots of acid gases.
sentences.sContent_eng: As one of substitutes for fire-extinguishing agent of halogenated hydrocarbon, fire-extinguishing agent of halogenated hydrocarbon produces lots of acid gases.
sentences.sCn: 作为哈龙灭火剂气体替代物之一的卤代烃类灭火剂用于灭火时会产生大量的卤化氢酸性气体。

phrases.pCn: n. 碳氢燃料；烃类燃料

words.tran: [油气] 加氢裂化；氢化裂解
与水化合；成水合物（hydrate的过去分词形式）
[油气] 加氢裂化（hydrocrack的ing形式）；氢化裂解

trans.tranOther: a chemical compound that consists of  hydrogen  and  carbon  , such as coal or gas
